zeldaGames.name: Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time
zeldaGames.info: Coming out in 1998, this is considered to be not just one of the best zelda games, but one of the best games of all times by many gamers.

zeldaGames.name: Legend of Zelda Majoras Mask
zeldaGames.info: Coming out in 2000, this game took a darker spin on the Legend of Zelda franchise. It came out very shortly after its predecessor.

zeldaGames.name: Legend of Zelda Wind Waker
zeldaGames.info: Coming out in 2002, you were put into the open seas, it attempted to grasp the feeling of open worldness with its limited technology, with a recognizable art style.

zeldaGames.name: Legend of Zelda Twilight Princess
zeldaGames.info: Coming out in 2006, this game took more serious spin back on the series that the fans were craving, this game was characerized by the fact Link became a wolf.

zeldaGames.name: Legend of Zelda Skyward Sword
zeldaGames.info: Coming out in 2011, this game was the first game to be very reliant on the motion controls, despite it having a calming atmosphere, there are several creepy parts in this game.

zeldaGames.name: Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild
zeldaGames.info: Coming out in 2017, it is the most recent addition in the Legend of Zelda series, it delivered the first open world experience and broke several series conventions.

pokemonGames.name: Pokemon Red
pokemonGames.info: The first installment of the pokemon series, released in 1996, introduced a new world with 151 pocket monsters to catch.

pokemonGames.name: Pokemon Silver
pokemonGames.info: The second generation of pokemon released in 1999 with a real day night cycle and 100 new pokemon were added to the cast. It also had more color than the previous games.

pokemonGames.name: Pokemon Black
pokemonGames.info: The fifth generation of pokemon, released in 2010, is considered one of the best pokemon games of all time. It introduced moving models and an insane soundtrack.

pokemonGames.name: Pokemon X
pokemonGames.info: The sixth generation of pokemon released in 2013 and was the first 3d experience for pokemon fans. It introduced 72 new pokemon, a new type 'fairy', mega evolution, new encounter types like horde.

pokemonGames.name: Pokemon Sword
pokemonGames.info: The eighth generation of pokemon released in 2019 was supposed to be the first truly open world pokemon game. Pokemon is generally linear because of areas being unaccesible without beating gym leaders, but this game changed that. It did not truly achieve full open world though.

pokemonGames.name: Pokemon Violet
pokemonGames.info: The ninth and most recent generation of pokemon was released in 2022. 103 new pokemon were added bringing the total count to 1008 overall. This game was more successful at implementing the open world idea and introduced true coop experiences to the pokemon series.
